partnerDetails.about:
We are Artland Infotech, based in Al-Khobar. We provide comprehensive IT services and solutions across multiple digital platforms and technologies. Our major verticals are Computer/Network and Security Solutions

•   Firewalls / Anti-Virus Such us (Sophos, VMware, Veeam, Microsoft, Unitrends, Fortinet, , Kaspersky, Symantec .. etc )
•   Network Monitoring
•   Network Infrastructure (IP Telephone, CCTV, IP Cameras, Unified WLAN Access Points, UPS Solutions, Long Range Point to Point Wireless Connectivity)
•   Structured Cabling.
